backupModal.title: Recovery phrase not saved!
backupModal.description:
The recovery phrase (seed phrase) is the only key to your assets! In case of failure of the phone or other similar situations, it will be impossible to restore access to your assets without this phrase! We recommend that you save the phrase in a safe place right now! 
 
 If you are asked for a seed phrase, then you are dealing with scammers! 
 Do not tell the seed phrase under any circumstances!

hdEnableModal.title: Switch wallet to HD mode?
hdEnableModal.description: HD mode implies rotation of addresses for each transaction. The switching operation is irreversible.

AddCustomToken.description: Ethereum (ETH) and Tron (TRX) token/asset addresses are supported

cashback.pageSubtitle: Earn up to 30% of commissions with Trustee Wallet!

howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.info1Title: Does Trustee Wallet have a user rewards program?
howItWorks.info1Content: The program consists of cashback and a two-tier affiliate program, which ultimately allows you to receive up to 30% of Trustee commissions for purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies by invited users
howItWorks.info2Content: To activate, you need to invite 5 new users using your cashback link. After activation, you will receive 10% of the Trustee's commission from your exchanges. This feature is activated forever!
howItWorks.info3Title: What are the conditions of the affiliate program?
howItWorks.info3Content: Level 1 – 10% of the Trustee commission for purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies by invited users (activated from the first partner). The more friends install the wallet using your link, the more your income will be. Level 2 - activated when the structure's turnover exceeds 5000 USDT per week and will allow you to receive 10% of Trustee commissions from 2nd level users (partners of your partners).
howItWorks.info4Title: How to withdraw cashback and affiliate rewards?
howItWorks.info4Content: The minimum withdrawal amount is 2 USDT ERC-20

cashback.mainDescription: Invite five friends and start earning 10% cashback from the commission of your exchanges! Trustee returns up to 30% commission to its users!

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: This is the easiest way to buy or sell your cryptocurrency, you just have to select the crypto, its amount and the card that will be responsible for sending or receiving the UAH. Total amount you need to pay will contain some fee for using product, it will be calculated automatically. Please, note that the service is provided by means of integration with third-party partner services.

infoModal.title: Info
infoModal.XRP: A destination tag is a unique 9-digit figure assigned to each Ripple (XRP) account. It is used to identify the receiver in a Ripple transaction.
infoModal.XMR: Payment ID is an arbitrary and optional transaction attachment. The Payment ID is usually used to identify transactions to merchants and exchanges: Given the intrinsic privacy features built into Monero, where a single public address is usually used for incoming transactions, the Payment ID is especially useful to tie incoming payments with user accounts.
infoModal.XLM: Stellar Memo is an arbitrary and optional transaction attachment

errors.UI_CONFIRM_DOUBLE_SEND: The transaction has been sent to this address already, are you sure that you want to repeat the transaction?
errors.UI_CALCULATE_CUSTOM_FEE: Please, calculate actual custom fee to use for send
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BAD_CODE: Something went wrong, contact our support service, please,
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BAD_TX_TO_REPLACE: Transaction was not found, please check your internet connection. Possible delays for updating information
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_FEE: Insufficient balance of native currency %{symbol} to pay the network fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_FEE_OR_BAD_IN: Native currency (%{symbol}) balance cannot be updated. Please check your internet connection
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_TO_TRANSFER: Insufficient balance to send the transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_LEFT_FOR_FEE: Insufficient balance to pay the network fee - please use an option "Send All"
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_LEFT_FOR_DELEGAT: Insufficient balance to pay the delegated transaction - please use ERC20 standard transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE: The transaction has not received a network confirmation - please wait for the other transactions to be mined
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE_OR_MORE_FEE: The transaction has not received a network confirmation - please wait for the other transactions to be mined or place higher fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_CONFIRMED_FEE: Insufficient balance of native currency %{symbol} to pay the network fee - please wait for the other transactions to be mined
errors.UI_CONFIRM_CHANGE_AMOUNT_FOR_REPLACEMENT: Insufficient balance of native currency %{symbol} to pay - click yes, to take some fee from the recipient's amount, then in the next step you will see the recalculated transaction data
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_AS_FEE: Transaction replacement fee is too small
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_CONNECTED: Network is unreachable - please repeat the operation later
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_FOR_AN: Insufficient balance to make the transaction and to pay the minimal fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_WAIT_FOR_CONFIRM: Please wait for the other transactions to be mined or turn ON an option "Use unconfirmed transactions"
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_BIG_FEE_FOR_TRANSACT: Transaction fee is too high - please adjust the fee manually or send more funds
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_BIG_FEE_PER_BYTE_FOR: Transaction fee per byte is too high - please adjust the fee manually
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_SELF_TX_FORBIDDEN: Transactions to the same address are forbidden
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_XRP: Insufficient balance to make the transaction (Please keep not less than 20 XRP on balance)
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_DEST_: Insufficient funds - send not less than 20 XRP to activate the receiving address
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TAG_NEEDED_XRP: Destination Tag is incorrect - please enter the correct Destination Tag to make the transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_LEGACY_BALANCE_NEEDED_US: Insufficient BTC balance on linked USDT address - please wait or turn ON an option "Use unconfirmed transactions"
Insufficient or unconfirmed BTC balance on linked USDT address - please wait or turn ON an option "Use unconfirmed transactions"
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE_UAX_USE_ETH: The transaction has not received a network confirmation - please wait for the other transactions to be mined or use ERC20 standard transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_SSL: SSL library was not found - please update the system
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_PLEASE_SELECT_FEE: Please, select the available fee from the list
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_MUCH_GAS_ETH: Transfer requires too much gas - please check destination address if it is smart contract
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_MUCH_GAS_ETH_ERC20: Token transfer requires too much gas - please check smart contract as your balance could be locked
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BAD_SEND_NODE: No access to sending server or internet error - please try again
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_DOUBLE_SPEND: Please, regenerate transaction as outputs are changed or wait for the other transactions to be mined
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BANDWITH_ERROR_TRX: Insufficient balance for fee / bandwith limit is over

infoScreen.text1: TRUSTEE WALLET never sends your recovery phrase anywhere. Therefore, in case of device loss or failure, the only way to restore access to your funds is to use a recovery phrase.
infoScreen.checkbox1: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase I will lose my funds
infoScreen.checkbox2: I understand that I must view my recovery phrase in private with no cameras and eyes around
infoScreen.text2: Be very careful with recovery phrase - anyone with it can access or spend your funds. Please, do not tell the recovery phrase under any circumstances!

step0Screen.info: The recovery phrase is the only secret key to your assets. Store it securely!

step1Screen.title: Check
step1Screen.placeholder: Please, tap each word in the correct order to verify recovery phrase. To remove word from field tap on it again
